resources.string: You cannot record your metrics without location services.\nTurn on location services now?
completed your challenge and beat your time! Looks like you\'ll have to work harder!
completed your challenge lost to you! Congratulations!
Welcome to TrackRecordRace!\nThis app lets you track your individual runs, view some statistics on them, and even race your friends!
To begin an individual run without racing, press the run icon on the main screen.\nMake sure location services are on!
To begin, press the play icon. This will toggle to a pause function if needed.\n To finish and automatically save your run, press the stop icon.
To view and add your friends, click on the icon and enter the username of the person you want to add.\nTo delete a friend, click on the delete icon and enter their name in pop up box.

To begin a challenge, press the icon.
This will open up a running page. Run it as an individual run. When you have finished, press the Stop icon.
This will open up a window where you can select a friend to send the challenge to.
They will be sent the distance you ran and how long you did it in.

When another user sends you a challenge, you will recieve a notification on your phone.
 The challenge will also appear under your "Challenges" tab.
To respond to the challenge, press the "Run" button. This will take you to a run screen where you will complete the challenge. 
 When the challenge is complete, both users are notified and their win and lose counts adjusted.
